snippet: The singer-songwriter Lana Del Rey's debut album opens at No. 2 despite complaints about her name, her songwriting and her lips.
abstract: The singer-songwriter Lana Del Rey's debut album opens at No. 2 despite complaints about her name, her songwriting and her lips.
lead_paragraph: Lana Del Rey, the singer-songwriter who has become a piñata for music bloggers -- they have attacked her for her stage name, her songwriting, her lips -- has gotten the last laugh as  her debut album opened at No. 2 on Billboard's album chart, beaten only by the sales juggernaut that is Adele.

headline.main: Lana Del Rey Trumps Her Critics
